input_args.passage: 'Cerdic of Wessex | Cerdic was the Saxon leader defeated by the Britons at the Battle of Mount Badon, probably fought in 490 (and possibly later, but not later than ...'
input_args.claim: 'From, we know that Wessex was invaded by a reinforced army, and Æthelred and Alfred, who are presumably West Saxon forces, won some victories and prevented the conquest of their kingdom.'
